jobDescription: JOB TITLE: Data AnalystJOB DESCRIPTION: Performs research and analysis for future and current strategy developments business opportunities, performance monitoring and operational enhancements. Improve data quality, data collection and analysis processes; develops data analysis methodologies and reporting. Educational Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Business, Statistics, Data Analytics or other related fields.Essential Functions:Identify, gather and analyze data to examine patterns & trends, and provide insights to enhance business decision making capability in business planning, process improvement, solution assessment, forecasting, etc.Recommend actions for future strategic developments & business opportunities, performance for existing initiatives and partnerships, as well as enhancements to operational programs/tacticsPerform data analysis through methodologies that include statistical analysis, forecasting and predictive analyticsJob Specifications:3 years of experience using business intelligence analytic software such as SAS, Cognos or SPSS to perform statistical, strategic, data and operational analysis3 years of experience performing data analysisDemonstrated ability to proactively develop, communicate and recommend solutions based upon business acumen and analysis performedExcellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to network, influence and build relationships with internal and external business partners and to express complex analytical and technical information to a variety of audiences at all levelsProficiency in management, interpretation and analysis of large datasets and report production and automationProficiency with Microsoft Suite applications such as; Excel, Access, Visual Basic, etc.Regularly exercises discretion and independent judgment in the performance of his/her job duties Please apply online or email [Click Here to Email Your Resumé]. If you dont meet these requirements, but are interested in other S.Com or Corestaff Services opportunities, please register with us online at ess.impellam.com Employer will not sponsor applicants for work visas for this position.s•com is an Equal Opportunity Employer - All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, or any other factor determined to be unlawful under applicable law.  #LI-HB1
